room_title: Escape room "Recon" by Conquer Escape Rooms in Sioux Falls
room_address: 310 Industrial Rd Suite A Harrisburg, SD 57032
room_description: Six months ago, a vigilante group known as Genesis released a virus into the world's water supply. The virus has caused a widespread epidemic, infecting millions of people. With symptoms turning deadly, you are faced with a race against the clock to find a cure and save what's left of humanity. You and your elite team of specialists are part of a secret mission code named Operation Recon. Your mission - infiltrate Genesis's secret laboratory, retrieve the vaccine, and escape the laboratory unnoticed. The fate of the world rests in your hands!
